definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
dead weight/weight capacity of a vehicle

sentences.english: The truck's load was over the limit allowed on the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车的负载量超出桥的载重限制。

sentences.english: What's the carrying capacity of this vessel? Please fill out clearly.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船的载重量多大，请填写清楚。

sentences.english: From the results of above analysis, we can come to conclusion that it is necessary to improve ride comfort for the bysical rider.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，有效的减轻载重车的振动是十分必要的。

sentences.english: The integrated control system of truck's assistant brakes based on CAN-Bus is developed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了基于CAN的载重汽车制动集中控制系统。

sentences.english: This batch of goods exceed the loading capacity of the truck. We'd better transport them seperately.
sentences.chinese: 这批货超过了车的载重量，还是分两批运吧。

sentences.english: The wooden bridge is not strong enough to allow the passage of lorries.
sentences.chinese: 这座木桥不够坚固，载重货车不能通行。

sentences.english: These are jeeps. Those are heavy-duty trucks.
sentences.chinese: 这些是吉普车，那些是载重汽车。

sentences.english: Burros reach an average height of over a meter and can weigh more than 225 kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 驴子的高度平均为一米并能载重超过225公斤。

sentences.english: The low weight increases the load capacity.
sentences.chinese: 因为重量轻，所以增加了载重量。

sentences.english: Tell that to every single HGV driver then?
sentences.chinese: 何不对跟每个载重物车辆的司机说？

sentences.english: The maximum load of the lorry is one ton.
sentences.chinese: 这卡车的最大载重量是一吨。

sentences.english: New regulations will soon come into force for the drivers of heavy vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 不久将实行新的载重汽车司机守则。

sentences.english: The crashworthiness of truck bumper in a low velocity crash was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 针对某重型载重汽车保险杠开展低速碰撞安全性研究。

sentences.english: The load should be no more than five tons.
Burros are known for their sure footing on mountains while carrying heavy loads.
sentences.chinese: 小驴因它们在山路上载重时的沉稳步伐而广为人知。

definition: dead weight/weight capacity of a vehicle
